Package utils

Class MessageUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.MessageUtils
  • public class MessageUtils
extends Object
    Handles the functions with which telegram messages are sent. Kind of like 'front end'

    • Method Detail

      • getMessageUtils

        public static MessageUtils getMessageUtils()
        Returns:
        MessageUtils

      • sendDebugMessage

        public boolean sendDebugMessage​(UpnotifyBot ub,
                                String threadId,
                                String chatId,
                                org.telegram.telegrambots.meta.api.objects.Update update)
        Answers with our debug message, containing thread info together with all the data from the update. Removes the debug message in @WAIT_UNTIL_MESSAGE_DELETE seconds
        Parameters:
        ub - Reference to our bot object.
        threadId - ID of the thread within the pool.
        chatId - ID of the chat that the debug message is to be sent to.
        update - the update that is to be converted to string and printed.
        Returns:
        true if message had been sent successfully, false otherwise.

      • checkSiteHTTPResponse

        public boolean checkSiteHTTPResponse​(UpnotifyBot ub,
                                     String threadId,
                                     String chatId,
                                     String url)
        Checks the HTTP response of the stie and sends a message accordingly // * @TODO MOVE THE WEB RELATED CODE TO A DIFFERENT CLASS // * @PROBLEM https://tau.edu.tr doesn't work cuz it is not signed etc
        Parameters:
        ub - the upnotify bot instance
        threadId - id of the thread on which this request is running
        chatId - id of the chat where the message is to be sent
        url - url of the page to be checked
        Returns:
        true if ran without exceptions, false otherwise

      • checkIfHTMLBodyStatic

        public boolean checkIfHTMLBodyStatic​(UpnotifyBot ub,
                                     String chatId,
                                     String url)
        Checks if html body of site is PROBABLY static.
        Parameters:
        ub - the upnotify bot instance
        chatId - id of the chat where the message is to be sent
        url - url of the page to be checked
        Returns:
        true iff ran without exceptions, false otherwise

      • sendWelcomeMessage

        public boolean sendWelcomeMessage​(UpnotifyBot ub,
                                  String threadId,
                                  String chatId)
        Sends a welcome image to the user
        Parameters:
        ub - the upnotify bot instance
        threadId - id of the thread that called this function
        chatId - id of the chat where the image is supposed to be sent
        Returns:
        true iff ran without exceptions, false otherwise

      • sendHelpMessage

        public void sendHelpMessage​(UpnotifyBot ub,
                            String chatId,
                            org.telegram.telegrambots.meta.api.objects.Update update,
                            User upUser)
        Sends message that contains general relevant info about the user and the bot. only some html tags are available, take a look at https://core.telegram.org/bots/api ctrl+f HTML ()
        Parameters:
        ub - the upnotify bot instance
        chatId - id of the chat where the help message is to be sent
        update - update instance (update contains all info about a new message or so received by bot)
        upUser - user that sent the request for the update

      • addRequestAndSendConfirmation

        public void addRequestAndSendConfirmation​(UpnotifyBot ub,
                                          String chatId,
                                          org.telegram.telegrambots.meta.api.objects.Update update,
                                          User upUser,
                                          ArrayList<String> args)
        Add a request to the database and to the thread pool and send information message to user
        Parameters:
        ub - the upnotify bot instance
        chatId - id of the chat where the message is to be sent
        update - update instance (update contains all info about a new message or so received by bot)
        upUser - user that sent the request for the update
        args - info about the request that is to be added

      • sendWarningMessage

        public void sendWarningMessage​(UpnotifyBot ub,
                               String threadId,
                               String chatId,
                               int messageId)
        Sends warning message to the user about the incorrect usage of a command and recommends the 'help' command
        Parameters:
        ub - the upnotify bot instance
        threadId - id of the thread where this function is called
        chatId - id of the chat
        messageId - id of the message that is to be replied to (that is the cause of the warning)

      • sendNotificationMessage

        public void sendNotificationMessage​(UpnotifyBot ub,
                                    Long telegramId,
                                    String notificationTxt,
                                    BufferedImage notificationIm)
        Send (up)notification message to the user about one of the Upnotify Requests of theirs
        Parameters:
        ub - the upnotify bot instance
        telegramId - id of private user or group chat
        notificationTxt - the notification to be sent
        notificationIm - the image that is to be added to the notification

      • editRequest

        public void editRequest​(UpnotifyBot ub,
                        String chatId,
                        User upUser,
                        ArrayList<String> args)
        Edits an upnotify request with given arguments
        Parameters:
        ub - the upnotify bot instance
        chatId - id of the chat where the resp. request is present
        upUser - user of the bot
        args - new request parameters

      • seeRequests

        public void seeRequests​(UpnotifyBot ub,
                        String chatId,
                        User upUser,
                        Integer msgIdToReply)
        Shows requests within a private or group chat
        Parameters:
        ub - the upnotify bot instance
        chatId - id of the chat
        upUser - user data
        msgIdToReply - message to be replied to

      • removeRequest

        public boolean removeRequest​(UpnotifyBot ub,
                             String chatId,
                             User upUser,
                             Integer msgIdToReply,
                             String arg)
        Removes a request from the db and the thread pool
        Parameters:
        ub - the upnotify bot instance
        chatId - id of the chat
        upUser - user data
        msgIdToReply - message to reply to (the original removal request message)
        arg - id's of the requests to be removed
        Returns:
        true iff ran without errors

      • toggleRequest

        public boolean toggleRequest​(UpnotifyBot ub,
                             String chatId,
                             User upUser,
                             Integer msgIdToReply,
                             String arg)
        Toggles the activity status of a request
        Parameters:
        ub - the upnotify bot instance
        chatId - id of the chat
        upUser - user data
        msgIdToReply - message id to be replied to
        arg - id's of requests the activity statuses of which are to be toggled.
        Returns:
        true iff ran without errors.
